transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello haanji madam.
Executive: Haanji Prachi Srivastava IndiaMART se aapne call kiya tha aaj 96 wale number pe?
Customer: Ji ji ji ji ji ji.
Executive: Uh sir maine aapko bataya tha na ki aapko koi bhi issue hota hai aapke account mein to aapko mujhe call karna hai. I think aapne number save nahi kara abhi tak.
Customer: Aapka number ye number hai kya aapka?
Executive: Haanji maine pehle bola tha isko save kar lijiye. Agar number yaad nahi rehta hai ya fir aap save nahi kar paaye to aapke profile mein dikhta hai na account manager kaun hai.
Customer: Achha khud dikhta nahi isliye to aapko phone kara usme aa raha bank update ka aa raha hai. Bank update mujhe karna nahi to kyu daal rakha aapne bar bar wo profile wahi aa jati hai kuch dikh hi nahi raha usme.
Executive: Kya aa raha hai?
Customer: Teen char bank update ka message aa raha hai bar bar show kar raha bank update aapka whatsapp hai, hi likh ke bhejiye jara.
Executive: Haan is number pe na screenshot bhej dijiye.
Customer: Whatsapp likh ke bhejiye.
Executive: Main bhej rahi hu aur jab aapne ye complaint matlab jab aap customer care mein call karte ho na.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To aapko is number pe karna hota hai account manager pe but agar aap customer care mein call karte ho.
Customer: Ab mujhe whatsapp pe aapne kisko whatsapp bhejiye to batao madam.
Executive: Sir suniye abhi main aapko ek cheez bata rahi hu jo ki important hai. Aapne jo 96 wale number pe call kiya hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Usse complaint raise hogi ya to main wo close kar du?
Customer: Wo baad mein close karna pehle ek photo bheja hu iska wo batao solution. Uske baad close kariyo.
Executive: Okay complaint problem ke against nahi hai. Number number bataiye aap apna.
Customer: 781
Executive: 781
Customer: 1786
Executive: 781 ke baad?
Customer: 786
Executive: 786 9087
Customer: 9087 Mujhe bhejiye abhi main dekhti hu.
Executive: Call cut mat kariyega main on call hi dekhungi.
Customer: Haan whatsapp on kar lijiye main wo bhej raha hu aapko jo main to bol raha hu. Haanji.
Executive: Ye dekhiye madam ye update aa raha hai. Ab mere se usme kuch karna kar hi nahi pa raha bank detail mujhe chahiye nahi kyu update kara rahe ho aap mujhse kyu jarurat le rahe ho.
Executive: To main ek bar check kar lu na sir fir dekhti hu aapko kyu aa raha hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Matlab apni marzi se kaam karoge aap log madam. Kai din se problem aa rahi hai maine kaha ho sake waise hi aa rahi ho.
Executive: Sir aap na next time se koi problem aati hai is number pe whatsapp pe mujhe bhej dijiye main dekhungi.
Customer: Chaliye main bhej dunga ab aage se dhyan rakhna. Jab bhi login kar rahe hain tabhi bhi yahi aa raha hai profile us pe.
Customer: Haan ye maine dobara delete karne ke baad bhi aur laptop pe check kara to bhi yahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Bank details ek minute main na line pe rahiyega aapki profile dekhti hu.
Customer: Ye bank detail aa raha hai ye show kara raha hai verification bank detail and continue. Aage continue karo usse pehle bank detail dal dunga main nahi dalunga bank detail.
Executive: Haanji haanji koi baat nahi main dekh rahi hu.
Executive: Tab tak aap ye mera number save kar lijiye.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai main save karunga. Kya naam hai aapka?
Executive: Prachi.
Customer: Prachi ji thik hai. Aap line pe rahiyega main aapki profile check kar rahi hu aapko on call hi bata deti hu.
Executive: Bank details.
Executive: Got it. Ek second.
Customer: Show kara raha na koi leads dekh pa raha na kuch kar pa raha main teen char din se bataiye.
Executive: Haanji dekh haanji dekh rahi hu sir.
Customer: Aur aapke yahan se phone ho raha hai sir mere paas mein.
Executive: Hello. Sir ye main dekh rahi hu aapki profile. Saari details aapne enter nahi ki hai na kabhi bhi.
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Ye bank details aapne add nahi kari hui na pehle hi pehle bhi.
Customer: No no no nahi nahi nahi kari kabhi. Jarurat hi nahi hai.
Executive: Sir ye verification hume nahi lekin aapki profile mein add karna hota hai ye verification process hai isme koi issue nahi hota hai.
Customer: Main mujhe deni nahi na baat khatam ho gayi. Nahi deni bank detail kisi ko share nahi karni hai.
Executive: Sir ye to process hi hota hai agar aapko nahi karni hai to ek bar main.
Customer: Haan. Mujhe nahi karni bank detail nahi deni baat khatam ho gayi.
Executive: Koi baat nahi sir main. Main koi aapke paise aapke through to aap saso ko paisa le liya main aaj tak batao.
Executive: Nahi nahi wo uske liye nahi hota hai agar aapne IndiaMART mein profile banayi hai wo sirf verification process hai. Pehli baat thodi hai to kai bar se chal rahi hai abhi aayi hai sunne mein bhi.
Executive: Ye isliye kyunki abhi aapne services main dekh rahi hu ek second.
Customer: Aapke yahan se aapne batao aapke yahan se kab se aayi hai abhi kisi bande ka phone aaya tha aapke yahan se.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: To wo keh raha tha aapke ek complaint mail dali aapne usko paise nahi diye maine pehle to batao aapki mail kis naam se bani hai work order kis naam se hai.
Customer: To wo na to mere naam se work order hai sunn to lijiye na to mere naam se work order hai na mere naam se wo hai sirf mobile number mera hai to mobile number ke bihaf pe aap ye cheez lagaoge.
Executive: Ye jo.
Customer: Aapne mobile number mujhe diya. Haanji bataiye bataiye.
Customer: Aapne mobile number mujhe diya abhi.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Main aapka mobile number kahin laga du.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: To aap uski payment agar maine kahin se udhar le liya aur aapka number dal diya to meri payment aap doge?
Executive: Nahi wo to aapki baat sahi hai sir genuine.
Customer: Ye keh rahe hain meri last aapse baat hui thi na jab iske jo aapki complaint raise hui thi ye maine 2.5 lakh wala aapse discuss kara tha na.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Tab meri last aapse baat hui aapne bola tha ki ye inse aap dealing nahi karte ho.
Customer: Haan dealing mein karta bol to raha hu jab dealing nahi hai to bina faltu kyu likh rahe ho. Ya mere naam se work usse work main cheez hai na aap usse.
Executive: Ye Vrinda Enterprises hai aapne bolta inse aapka business hi nahi hua hai abhi tak.
Customer: Bilkul.
Executive: Thik hai to ek kaam karti hu main na aap abhi ruk jaaiye main apne ek bar senior se discuss kar leti hu aapka ye bank details ka.
Customer: Haan wo keh raha main conference mein le lo main kisi se kyu baat karu ji pehle to ye batao mera kya matlab kisi se baat karne ka.
Executive: Dekho ab main aapko ek cheez batati hu jo bank details wala hai na ye ye ek bar main apne senior se confirm karke usko aapko call back karke bataungi to uski tension mat lijiye pehli baat dusra jo ye complaint raise hui hai jo abhi chal raha hai ki nahi aapne business kara hai wo keh rahe hain kara hai.
Executive: To jo hamari team hai wo aapko call karegi mail bhi karegi is cheez ke regarding aap unse discuss kariyega wo acche se bata denge.
Customer: Mail mail pe dal do na mail lijiye na mail ka revert de dunga main aapko mujhe mail kyu nahi dala ya to banda mujhe ya to mujhe wo work order de to samajh mein aata mere naam se work order ho.
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Bhai aisa nahi hai ki aapke against agar complaint raise hui hai to aapko karna hi padega dekhiye jo hamari team hai jo us complaint ko check karti hai usko work karti hai.
Customer: Complaint check karne ki baat nahi hai agar aap meri baat to suno aapne credit card liya kisi se.
Customer: Thik hai.
Customer: Reference mein aapne do number mange usne aapne mera number dal diya.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Tab aapne mujhe naam bata diya Prachi main to aapko jaan gaya maine aapka number dal diya. Thik hai.
Customer: Ab wo saal do saal chala gaya wo to aap mujhse paise loge kya ye samajhna samjhana chah raha hu.
Executive: Are wo to sir aapki baat main samajh gayi main isiliye yahi keh rahi hu aapko ki us cheez ke bare mein aapko jo hamari team hai na jo is complaint pe kaam kar rahi hai wo call karti hai mail karti hai ye cheez aap unko discuss kijiye wo samjhenge tabhi wo aage execute karenge na wo cheez ko karte hain.
Customer: Wo bata diya unko mail aayi nahi hai main bata diya unko. Haan to koi baat nahi wo apne hisab se khud se kaam kar lenge us cheez ki tension mat lijiye aap agar aapne apni side se bata diya hai.
Customer: Ab ye to hata dijiye fir ye matlab.
Executive: Main kar deti hu abhi. Thik hai ye jo aapne call kari hai complaint raise kar du main wo sorry close kar du?
Customer: Wo close kar dijiye. Next ek cheez aur hai jaise main ye close karungi abhi.
Customer: Haan. Ye 96 wale number ka to aapke mail pe na ek wo jayega feedback wala is complaint ka to us pe satisfied mark kijiye ga tab ye close hogi.
Executive: Thik hai. Aur ye mere side ka feedback hai mere against complaint raise kar di aapne.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai main thik hai. Thik hai.
Executive: Koi baat nahi main kar deti hu abhi. Okay ji okay. Ye hata dijiye matlab.
summary:
Concerns:

- Facing issue with bank update notification.

- Wants to remove bank details update notification.

- Complaining about a previous issue of non-payment.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to share screenshot on WhatsApp.

- Executive explained the bank detail verification process.

- Executive assured to discuss the bank details issue.

- Executive assured the customer about the complaint.

- Executive closed the complaint.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will confirm with senior about bank details.

- Customer to mark satisfied on feedback form.



Alert (If Any):

complaint

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- bank details, complaint, verification, feedback
